ActorTalk: Welcome to Kuroro Coffee, what can I—wait? Gray Raven Commandant!
It really is you! Manager Ross always talks about you. Says you make coffee like a pro. Never thought I'd meet you in person!
I just got my barista license. Making coffee in front of you? That's... a lot. But hey, we've got this interactive thing going on—you can brew your own, try some latte art. Interested?
Maybe another time. Just looking to relax a bit right now.
O-okay... C'mon. Keep calm. Take a breath... W-what can I get for you?
I'll have a Hazelnut Snow Latte with a clover design for the latte art. Commandant—
One Hazelnut Snow, clover design, got it! Coming right up!
Clover, clover, clover... Here you go!
...Foam's too thick...
(That voice again...)
Commandant...?
How did it end up like this? Oh no, I frothed the milk too much... I'm sorry! I'll make you a new one right away!
...It's alright. This one's fine.
Really? Are you sure? Then, what about you, Gray Raven Commandant?
O-okay, just a moment... No mistakes this time! Please enjoy.
We're just here for a drink. No pressure.
Still nervous, huh?
No rush. Take your time.
I'll have the same.
No latte art for me.
